structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section: Any owner, employee, or agent of a DPTS that knowingly or wantonly violates the provisions of KRS 65.752(2) shall be fined not less than twenty-five dollars ($25) nor more than two hundred dollars ($200) or imprisoned in the county jail for not more than ninety (90) days, or both. Each day the violation continues shall be considered a separate offense.

Any owner, employee, or agent of a DPTS or a service supplier that violates the provisions of KRS 65.752(3) shall be subject to the following penalties:
For a first offense, a Class A misdemeanor; and
For a second and subsequent offense, a Class D felony.

law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 521, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998.
